entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned in the text as a person who was caught by surprise along with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned in the text as a person who laughed and started applauding hard along with the rest of the crowd.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned in the text as a person who was caught by surprise along with Ron and Cedric.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the text as a person who was being cheered on by Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned in the text as a person who was clapping very hard too.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is mentioned in the text as a person who didn't look happy at all and attempted to engage Hermione in conversation again.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is mentioned in the text as a person who continued speaking about the third and final task.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned in the text as a person who began herding the champions and hostages back to the castle.

relationships.description: Ron applauded for Harry along with the rest of the crowd.
Fleur clapped for Harry very hard too.
Krum attempted to engage Hermione in conversation again, but she was too busy cheering on Harry.
Bagman informed the champions about the third and final task that will take place at dusk on the twenty-fourth of June.
